title: Calligraphers in the UK
content:
Morning all!

I’ve just arrived in the studio, and my boss’s first question... “Do I know of any well known calligraphers in the UK or working from the UK..?” My first answer was not really, but I know a place that will... I understand that I can google the question, but I’d never get the ’right’ answers.

Any help would be much appreciated, even just a few links.

—  
Rez +

 [‹ Christmas Cards](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3954 "Go to previous forum topic") [Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds: Ouija board ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174008/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41415 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Rez Oo

comments.content:
You should contact the Edward Johnston Foundation in Ditchling.

[http://www.ejf.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174008/http:/www.ejf.org.uk/ "http://www.ejf.org.uk/")

You should be able to find some people here:

[http://www.letterexchange.org/members.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174008/http:/www.letterexchange.org/members.html "http://www.letterexchange.org/members.html")

Callligraphy Links site (UK calligraphers here).  
 [http://www.cynscribe.com/UK.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174008/http:/www.cynscribe.com/UK.html "http://www.cynscribe.com/UK.html")

Also... not listed is Tony Forster who is an excellent commercial calligrapher/lettering artist.
